DOC.brief_summary: The proposed project will study the consequence of short term limb immobility on the patterns of brain activity using functional imaging (fMRI)
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Cortical Plasticity Following Short Term Limb Immobility
DOC.criteria: wrist fracture. Fit for MRI scanning. Unwillingness to sign informed consent. Neurological disease s/p fractures
